name: Harte-Hanks Data Technologies
overview: Harte-Hanks Data Technologies, Inc., also known as Harte-Hanks Trillum Software, operates as a customer relationship management company in the United States. It provides end-to-end information-based solutions. The company specializes in integrated services, including database marketing, response management, and multimedia and Internet services. It offers Trillium Software, which enables organizations to achieve data quality by providing technologies and services, including global data profiling, data cleansing, enhancement, and data linking for e-business, customer relationship management, enterprise resource planning, supply chain management, and data warehousing. Harte-Hanks Data Technologies, Inc. serves pharmaceutical, healthcare, insurance, retail, financial, automotive, telecommunications, gaming, sports, non-profit, education, and business service industries. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Billerica, Massachusetts with additional offices in the United Kingdom and Germany. Harte-Hanks Data Technologies, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Harte-Hanks, Inc.
